column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////As for the sides
column2: obviously can't recommend the sweet potato.  The brussel sprouts though... were incredible
column4: just the right amount of acidity that paired perfectly with our steaks.  The truffle mac was also pretty good
column5: though you really don't get any truffle flavor here
column6: generic truffle oil usage to "class up" good ol mac n cheese is my assumption here
